author: newsr.in
title: Steven Tyler Threatening to Sue Donald Trump Over 'Dream On' Use During Campaign
text: Donald Trump may have a lawsuit headed his way. According to TMZ, the 69-year-old presidential hopeful is being threatened legally by Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler for the use of the band’s hit song, “Dream On,” during campaign events. This is reportedly the second time a cease and desist letter has been sent. Apparently, Steven is [...] »
